outputs.output_descr: The Annual Work Plan provides support through strategic interventions to Government for capacity development and to support coordination with specific reference to the UN Reform. It will enable rapid responses to development challenges focusing on areas of Democratic Governance, Crisis Prevention and Recovery, Environment, Millennium Development Goals and poverty reduction and GoPNG priorities as laid out in the Medium Term Development Strategy. Special consideration will be given to initiatives which incorporate cross cutting issues such as Gender, Human Rights, HIV and AIDS and Climate Change. Support may come through the funding of consultancies services, capacity development related measures, pilot and preparatory interventions and activities that strengthen the cooperation and partnership between the Government and UNDP as well as international integration. A strengthened cooperation and focus on the mentioned areas will help to increase the effectiveness of UN development interventions and thus directly support the Government in achieving the Millennium Development Goals (MDGs).

project_descr: Support through strategic initiatives provided to Government for Coordination and Capacity Development
